dc:title: A Baby is Born
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A vivid description of a young woman leaving St. Joseph's house by ambulance to have her baby. Expresses joy at the child's birth even in the midst of poverty and a time of war. "With the woman the suffering brought forthy life. In war, death."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 186 1941-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
